column5: I use a trolling motor on my SportsPal canoe and I'd like to have a removable 12v socket for it. I go island camping a couple times a year and it'd be nice to blow up an air mattress with the battery or charge a phone.  I know I can buy the minnkota battery box but figure I can save some $ and do a DIY project.  Anyone done that? Things to know?
You can buy one that clips on the battery with alligator clips.
Oh that would be perfect, I'll have to go searching more. Thz
Princess auto probably sells something like that.
Just found $6 at CT lol.  Cheers
I keep one in my boat for cell phone charging.
